meanings.definition: To style or design something again.
meanings.sent1: She decided to restyling her old dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: I am planning to restyling my room next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept restyling the blanket in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like restyling a dull painting into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef's creativity in restyling leftovers amazed everyone.

meanings.sent1: The restyling of the car's interior made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: I love the restyling of this magazine layout.
meanings.sent3: The restyling of the garden was a community project.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a stunning restyling of vintage fashion.
meanings.sent5: The restyling of the website attracted more visitors.
